home.explanation: Select a language to view a resume. They are printer friendly.

resume.title: Resume
resume.name: Timo Hermans
resume.intro: I am a full stack software engineer that has a strong affection for frontend development. People know me as someone who catches on quickly, whether it's about a new stack or a new domain. I'm also good at transferring this knowledge to others with great pleasure. I'm skilled in everything that's web development and teaching or guiding people. I'm always looking for new challenges to sharpen my skills.

kabisa.title: Developer / Consultant
kabisa.companyDescription: Kabisa's specialty is software solutions for Hightech, Logistics & (Complex) E-Commerce companies.

task1.title: Full stack web development for camping booking company Vacansoleil
task1.description3: Working in an agile way in a dedicated Scrum team

netpresenter.title: Frontend developer / Scrum master
netpresenter.companyDescription: Netpresenter is a narrowcasting company that maintains and further develops its business to business software. They are also responsible for the European Amber Alert.

task1.title: Angular and Electron web development
task1.description1: Improving the new frontend CMD on a wide variety of aspects - Angular / Unit testing / Cypress / CI / Docker / Sass / HTML
task1.description2: Promoting and starting an agile way of working within the development department of Netpresenter - Scrum / Scrum master

Mediaan.title: Software engineer / Team lead
Mediaan.companyDescription: Mediaan delivers custom made software on project basis. It also has some AI solution services as well.

task1.title: Full stack web development
task1.description1: Designing and implementing of an inspection tool for the industrial company PDM Group - Angular / .NET Core / Azure DevOps / Azure
task1.description2: Developing and maintaining of a transaction marketplace for the bank HSBC Germany - Angular / .NET Core / Azure DevOps / Azure / Scrum
task1.description3: Expanding and maintaining an ERP system for health insurance company Aevitae - Angular JS / .NET Web API / Oracle / Scrum
task1.description4: Further development of an app that enabled charging of electric cars for the company Innogy - Angular / Cordova / GraphQL / Jira / Scrum
task1.description5: Designing and developing a tool that automatically generates chat bots based on deterministic data for the company PNA - .NET Chat Bot Framework / LUIS / SQL Server

task2.title: Team lead responsibilities
task2.description1: Teaching a web development curriculum on Zuyd University Heerlen
task2.description2: Teaching a cross platform mobile development minor on Zuyd University Heerlen
task2.description3: Guiding and teaching several interns, ranging from web to VR development. Zuyd University, Fontys, PXL, Groningen University
task2.description4: Designed and executed a plan for seniors within Mediaan to learn a modern web development  stack.
task2.description5: Went to several events on various locations to promote Mediaan

bannerconnect.title: Software engineer
bannerconnect.companyDescription: Bannerconnect provided online advertising services to customers. The software being made was used for internal use.
